title: Small rooms, powerless front desk. Additional charges. Just not right.
text: The first room they put me in had an AC that blew hot air and couldn't turn off. Changed rooms and that room made a noise, noise checked by the engineer who would call the front desk to advise to move again. That didn't happen so I went to inquire, front desk didn't know anything. Moved to another room which was small but without faults. The manager apologised and offered 1 free breakfast. Breakfast is average but expensive. Check the prices well before booking because the fees presented are not including things like facility fees (wifi & gym) of USD 30 per day. Overall disappointing despite the effort of the manager. You don't willingly put people into rooms with defects, that is just not right.
